title: Changing Mastery/Rune pages in champ select
body:
OK has anyone actually had this before, they've selected their champ, clicked to changed their runes/masteries, and once they game is nearly starting, gone to check they are correct, only to find that one of them didnt change?

Because i have, and its become a problem because it happens to me almost every time im in champ select. im not sure if its a bug, but it needs to be fixed

seems to me as if its a packet loss thing, or something, but i have a good connection to the game, and yet it happens to me far too often.

replies.body: If you're looking at a third party site, sometimes it won't display the right page that you are using (maybe the page from the game before). You should be able to tell if it is the correct page by looking at your in game stats such as ad, ap, as, ms, armour and MR.
usually it will change, but it still displays the previous name of the rune/masteries, it does it a lot to me.
